Articles.Content:
Any mods that add whole new space-plane inspired parts that add these http://www.rocketplaneglobal.com/& https://danielmarin.naukas.com/2016/08/03/los-buran-que-nunca-fueron-2/mtkvp01/ & This? Also for now what is the best wing shape w/o part clipping & should i use structural fuselage sections or hollow sections in the front & put the rocket fuel in the back? Also should i use low profile tails or standard V or T tails in the mean time? And should i use RCS build aid & Correct COL & or wind tunnel mod to help design it? 

?
